issue.title: [JS] Set up Conbench
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12690](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12690). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Set up https://conbench.ursa.dev to continuously report benchmark results from JS.
